com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keyagree

Class LunaKeyAgreementEcDhCWithKdf512

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.crypto.KeyAgreementSpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keyagree.LunaKeyAgreementEcDh
        • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keyagree.LunaKeyAgreementEcDhCWithKdf512

  • public class LunaKeyAgreementEcDhCWithKdf512
extends LunaKeyAgreementEcDh
    This class implements an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman key agreement with Cofactor multiplication and the SHA512 KDF, where the private key is stored on the HSM. The shared secret is created on the HSM but is extractable.

      • checkPublicKey

        protected void checkPublicKey(java.security.Key key,
                  boolean lastPhase)
                       throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                              java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Checks the parameters to engineDoPhase().
        Parameters:
        key - The other party's public key
        lastPhase - Must be set to true
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If this key agreement has not been initialized, or if lastPhase is false
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the pubic key's slot doesn't match the private key's slot

      • engineGenerateSecret

        protected int engineGenerateSecret(byte[] sharedSecret,
                       int offset)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                   javax.crypto.ShortBufferException
        Generates the shared secret, and places it into the buffer sharedSecret, beginning at offset inclusive.

        If the sharedSecret buffer is too small to hold the result, a ShortBufferException is thrown. In this case, the key agreement is not reset and the call can be repeated with a larger output buffer.

        Successful completion of this method resets this KeyAgreement object, so that it can be reused for further key agreements. Unless this key agreement is reinitialized with one of the init methods, the same private information will be used for subsequent key agreements. However, doPhase will have to be called after every call to generateSecret in order to re-initialize the public information.

        Specified by:
        engineGenerateSecret in class javax.crypto.KeyAgreementSpi
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - The buffer for the shared secret
        offset - The offset in sharedSecret where the shared secret will be stored
        Returns:
        The number of bytes places into sharedSecret
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If this key agreement has not been completed yet
        javax.crypto.ShortBufferException - If the given output buffer is too small to hold the secret

      • getDerivedKeyLength

        protected int getDerivedKeyLength(long algId)
                           throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Returns the derived key length in bytes for a key of the given algorithm. A "generic secret" key will have the same length as the DH/ECDH keys used to create it.
        Parameters:
        algId - Algorithm of the secret key
        Returns:
        Length of the secret key, in bytes
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm id is not recognized
